articles.author: Tobi Raji
articles.title: RFK-backed infant vaccine study in Africa to proceed despite backlash, U.S. says - The Washington Post
articles.description: U.S. funding for a study on the timing of hepatitis B vaccine doses in infants in Guinea-Bissau has sparked confusion and ethics concerns.
articles.content: A U.S.-backed study set to examine the overall health effects of hepatitis B vaccine dose timing on some 14,000 infants in the West African country of Guinea-Bissau has raised ethics concerns among s… [+106 chars]
